name: Psyhippie
description:
Merry adventures of a hippie with split personality. Beat up a horde of bloodthristy bikers while drinking yerba mate.

Made in 48 hours for Slavic Game Jam 2015.

Programming by Piotr Gieroba
@pgieroba

Graphics by Nekhara
nekhara.daportfolio.com

Music by Dawid W. Mika
dawidwmika.com

Listen to the soundtrack:
https://soundcloud.com/dawidwmika/psyhippie-soundt...
